thread.title: Mike Petrusky Joins iOFFICE as Director of Events and Growth Marketing

author: cnbc.com
title: Mike Petrusky Joins iOFFICE as Director of Events and Growth Marketing
text:
HOUSTON, March 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- A big personality and influencer in the FM arena has joined iOFFICE . Mike Petrusky , a luminary speaker, podcaster, entrepreneur and seasoned marketer will now lead the company’s efforts to attract ever broader audiences via the web and live events, ranging from IFMA to CoreNet and iOFFICE’s Annual Customer Summit. In addition to running iOFFICE events, Mike will bring his admired “FM Innovator” Podcast to iOFFICE and take an active role in speaking engagements around the country, sharing iOFFICE’s unique brand of thought leadership to CRE, FM and IT leaders in the digital workplace.
Mike Petrusky Joins iOFFICE as its new Director of Events and Growth Marketing
“Bringing Mike onboard means taking our live events platform to a new level,” said Elizabeth Dukes, co-founder and CMO of iOFFICE. “Having deep conversations with the movers and shakers in our industry via the podcast and a great presence at more events means we’ll be able to connect really important content and ideas with a global audience.”
As the Director of Events and Growth Marketing, Mike will continue to run the wildly popular podcast FM Innovator Podcast and its growing audience of 5,000 monthly listeners. The podcast has featured industry luminaries including HOK’s Director of Workplace and Board Member Kay Sargent, Speaker and Author Jacob Morgan and FM Transitions President Teena Shouse. Mike will continue to tap the visionaries in the space alongside iOFFICE experts and customers on their practical approaches to tackling the digital workplace and elevating the employee experience.
With a passion for promoting workplace innovation, Mike founded Kayrell Connections to uplift the facility management community by encouraging professionals to "Be an FM innovator!®” In addition, Mike is a sought after keynote speaker and moderator at the highest levels of the FM industry and speaks regularly at national and local conferences for IFMA World Workplace and Facility Fusion , NFMT, and CoreNet . An active volunteer at IFMA, he also works to build partnerships and encourage collaboration between FM practitioners and industry experts.
“Working with iOFFICE puts into play all of my passions – elevating the workforce and workplace, killer technologies that have an impact, and inspiring our community to innovate. I couldn’t be happier to join such an incredible team,” said Mike Petrusky, Director of Events and Growth Marketing at iOFFICE.
About iOFFICE
iOFFICE is the leading workforce-centric IWMS software and the only 100% SaaS platform designed for the Digital Workplace. iOFFICE equips facilities, CRE, and workplace leaders with the real-time data and mobile tools to plan for the future of their workforce and workplace. iOFFICE HUMMINGBIRD is the first Employee Experience solution that allows employees to find, request, use and reserve the spaces, information, people and events they need while automatically collecting critical business intelligence. The iOFFICE MARKETPLACE is a growing network of vetted application partners offering from energy optimization, digital signage and wayfinding apps that use the iOFFICE platform. To learn how more than 2.4M users at 1400 fast-moving companies like Adobe, Big Fish Games, Homeaway, HESS, FBL, Sephora, Sodexo, McKesson, Publicis, Conde Nast, Under Armour and more are creating the most productive workplaces on earth, visit www.iOFFICEcorp.com and connect with iOFFICE on Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and LinkedIn @iOFFICE and the FM Innovator Podcast on iTunes.
